metadata.Title: CVE-2018-18310 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.Description:
An invalid memory address dereference was discovered indwfl_segment_report_module.c in libdwfl in elfutils through v0.174. Thevulnerability allows attackers to cause a denial of service (applicationcrash) with a crafted ELF file, as demonstrated by consider_notes.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-18310` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

elfutils - 0.165-3ubuntu1.2
libasm1 - 0.165-3ubuntu1.2
libdw1 - 0.165-3ubuntu1.2
libelf1 - 0.165-3ubuntu1.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: elfutils package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.165-3ubuntu1.2').
